Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: hoffa on March 21, 2012, 02:04 am
Quote from: cache on March 20, 2012, 11:53 am
It is the last photo I have of Bigglesworth before he had the awful accident with the Fleshlight, I put it up in honour of him.

LOL I definitely see the resemblance. Have you guessed why I am not here often at the moment? Because as much as I loved head fucking my supervisor. Really didnt expect his bitch ass to crack and quit. And while at the time the whole situation was funny as fuck! (My office will talk about this for years to come ;)) I was promoted up with more pay, which again seems to be all good. Let me tell you, I am the guy that does fuck all and likes it that way. My life was perfect, roll to work late, leave early, if the wind is blowing, fuck work in exchange for a wind surf. Not accountable to anyone except cunt lips, flirt with the office girlies and be admired? Long lunches early breakfasts client expense card, regular travel. All was Very, Very Excellent.

This my friends has all changed :-[ In what could be my very last work time post. I am drowning the sorrows of my what is now my collapsed world with my ice coffee in what hand and my very last Rastaman space cooking...

The sad reality is now this.

1. I have a team which I am now responsible for. The same people that once admired and encouraged my office shenanigans, now look at me with contempt. I have even heard whispers of me becoming the new "cunt lips" A name which I proudly gave to my ex super. Add to this the fact I need to "dress accordingly" I do in fact look into the mirror and at certain angles to be honest actually see my "cunt lips" growing before my eyes.

2. My working hours are now set in stone. "I am Expected" to arrive at the office each morning at 7:30am and to leave after everyone else leaves which means at least 5:30pm. I must present to my team at 9:30am the days projects and unfinished urgent work needs. In the past I have not known anything before 9:28am and to be honest usually 9:50 after I mess around and walk in during ex cunt lips announcement. With a mouth full of food proudly apologize for being late, while continuing to irate chad by talking to others about, sport, movies, or how the wife tried a new sexual position on me. Most importantly I will miss saying the following each and every morning. "Oh Chad can you in point form write up what was talked about today, as I hadn't realized I was supposed to be listening" In my first meeting I have already noticed wanna be Hoffa's starting to appear, and while they were annoying and patronizing to me, the little Hoffa inside me was envious of the attention the newbies were getting and to a certain degree I was proud of the legacy cool Hoffa had left behind.

3. And lastly and what was one part of my job I sincerely liked and was good at 'Must now cease immediately as I am to remember the position I have been placed in" I am no longer able to (what is referred now as) "sexually harass any employee or place them in a position that they may see or deem inappropriate"  I shit you not my friends, these exact words were in black and white on the employment contract I needed to sign. To say when I read it I was offended would be an understatement! I even emailed it over to a lawyer mate to ask if this is even legal. His response was short and painful. STFU you dickhead, You really need to stop calling me every time you get a fucked up issue. This news obviously sat me on my ass. I immediately notice a change in the office girls, no more smiles but sniggering comments, "he is not seriously wearing that" or does he really think he is cool"  Yet only last week my comments were followed be giggles of anticipation from these warm "welcoming" women "you are such a bad man" or "I will go for a drink with you only because you are married and I can trust you right?" Knowing fore-well trust is something that could ever be used to describe the old Hoffa)

Alas as the cookie is now in full effect and the fact that I have no one else to blame is slowly dawning on me, I ponder what my life will be. My advise to all of you that has taken the time to read the journey I have allowed myself to travel. Be respectful to those above you, as the repercussion of your actions (no matter how funny it is at the time) is far greater than any free man can comprehend.

Goodby my friends

Hoffa (but realistically and to be honest) Cunt Lips

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: cache on April 16, 2012, 10:10 am
Your acetone is definitely anhydrous? That is vital or you will dissolve your cocaine as well as the cut.
Ordinary coffee filter paper will be fine for this, try and get bleached ones if you can and make sure to wet them with acetone just before you pour your wash in.
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Raoul Duke on April 16, 2012, 10:30 am

yeah good man, i lost about 20% in the wash. it's not perfect, it doesn't smell but it still has a little bit of that coke taste, so tetravort must perform another step or 2 to get his gear THAT clean, but you can tell it's a lot cleaner when you do a line. lot easier on the nose as well, doesn't clog up half as much. didn't get the bulging eyeballs or the chin wobble so it definitely washed out whatever causes that - think that must be something in the manufacturing process causes that. pretty chuffed to be honest, i'll be doing it more often. just wondering how much i'll have left when i wash some of Daves.

just posted this in the coke vendors thread, but thought i'd post here as well cos i really don't know what to do about it:

i ordered half g of this 98% coke from Noriega on Friday and a delivery turned up yesterday (Monday), so that is bloody quick postage from NL to UK by anyones standards. my mrs knew i was expecting this one (she's now ok with me ordering half g's, and she's actually looking forward to trying some 98% cocaine - think that lab test finally swung her round to giving the gear another go :) ) so opened it up in front of her all excited, only to find..... half a gram of #3 smack! GUTTED!!! if my mrs didn't see it i would have just stashed it away and left it at that, but this is OUR first delivery from SR (as opposed to mine) only to be what she sees as a monumental cock-up. i msg'd Noriega about it last night but i'm pretty fucked as to know what to do now - obviously i can't send it back. still waiting on a reply.

what would you guys do in this situation? Noriega hasn't got back to me yet, but as i said there's no way he's gonna tell me to send it back, so i'm gonna have to flush the H cos the mrs will KICK MY ARSE if i keep it or i tell her 'it's ok, i've done this shit before, it's fucking all right!'. obviously i also couldn't tell her 'oh yeah, it's def #3 heroin, cos the #4 i got stashed upstairs is a lot whiter than this'. in fact she'd more than likely leave me - you know what birds are like; 'oh my god, you've done heroin, that means you're obviously addicted, it's all gonna go wrong, you're gonna lose your job, then the house then sell all we own, blah blah fucking blah, i've seen trainspotting, they're all like that'.

i'm not bad mouthing Noriega as i know it's obviously a genuine mistake, with 420 he must have been inundated with orders and fucked up on the address labels, but would you leave a 5 if this happened to you?
so pretty pissed off....probably not as pissed off as the guy who's jonesing for the heroin is going to be when my coke turns up in his mailbox, but FUCK SAKE.

i suppose all i can do is wait to see what Noriega says....

so fucking high right now, had a cunt of a day i tell ya! smoking some good bikie weed, which is code for, i have no fucking clue what strain it is haha.

it's definitely worth washing the gear mate, you can tell it's a lot cleaner the first line you do. shopping list is pretty simple:

1 x bottle PURE acetone. if it's not completely pure you will need
1 x epsom salts to bake and then put in the acetone to soak up everything that isn't acetone.
1 x pack of filters. coffee machine filters work fine
1 x set of balls of steel the first time, to commit to chucking all your coke into a liquid
infinite PATIENCE. keep half a gram of coke to the side so you've got something to do while waiting the 24 hours while the washed stuff dries.

where the fuck does the name 'bikie weed' come from??

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Raoul Duke on April 24, 2012, 09:24 am
yeah good thinking shiz, i think it'll be a mix of something with a bit of flour in there, there are white specks in it. fuck knows what i'm gonna do to disguise the smell though.

cache: i washed straight up with the acetone, i chucked a lines worth in at first and stirred it for a good few minutes, then filtered that bit and it didn't look as if i lost any, so i chucked the lot in a clean beaker with acetone.

acetone fucking stinks by the way, hums to high heaven of nail varnish remover, if you're gonna do it wait for her to fuck off out for a few hours - the wash itself doesn't take that long, but then you need to ventilate the room for a couple of hours to get the smell out.

the link i sent you on PM the other day is the real deal - that is definitely pure acetone. but don't get it off amazon, google the manufacturer and go to their site - it's cheaper. not that its expensive anyway, but a quids a quid at the end of the day

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: cache on April 24, 2012, 11:28 am
I like it when it gets really convoluted, it took me ages to work out why arse is "Arris".
It used to be that bottle-and-glass meant arse,  bottle-and-glass got contracted to bottle, the rhyming slang for bottle is Aristotle, which got shortened to Arris.

Cockney is like a different language!
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Raoul Duke on April 24, 2012, 11:54 am
i've never got the cash side of it -  i understand a bullseye because that's pretty obvious but why's 20 quid a score? and 500 a monkey?WTF is that all about?
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: cache on April 24, 2012, 12:02 pm
Score comes from the old days, they used to count in 20s and make a notch in a counting stick for every 20 items. Monkey is from the old Indian 500 rupee note, it had a picture of a monkey on it. Not sure about pony though.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: sollemnis on June 07, 2012, 02:12 pm
Drone (Mephedrone). It was made as an mdma replacement but got banned quickly. IMO it feels A LOT different to mdma. Has some similarities, music appreciation, empathy but that's about it. The empathy isn't as strong as MDMA's its more a sense of 'you're amazing bro'.

Feels like Coke and Speed as well, its more stimulating than MDMA, you feel like fucking superman, confidence goes through the roof and you can talk and talk. (why do you think I keep posting today hehe)

You can take it two ways, snort it or parachute it. If you snort it then 100mgs is enough, if you parachute it, 200--250mgs is enough.

If you parachute it, it lasts about 2 hours, snort it and it lasts about 30-45 min.

Unlike MDMA you can re-dose several times without losing the peak effects, when it wares of just do another line and your back where you started! My advice is to never order more than a gram, its fiendish.. and anything over a gram is too much.

I got mine from Googleyed and its top drone.. good packaging as well. Lim is getting more in stock soon, I've heard his is good but I've never tried it myself
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: sollemnis on June 07, 2012, 02:15 pm
Oh and as much as I hate to see it, the euphoria is more intense than MDMA's. mdma is a magic drug, nothing compares, but for the euphoria drone wins.
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: diskoking23 on June 07, 2012, 02:20 pm
That's the Mephodrone Hoff..

I'll fill you guys in on my DMT experience soon!!
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Knomo on June 07, 2012, 02:22 pm
Wow Sollem, really that short? I was thinking of getting some but.. 33eur/gram is quite expensive if it really doesn't last that long.. ::)
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: sollemnis on June 07, 2012, 02:35 pm
You can easily extend the duration IMO. I find parachuting 250mgs, then doing tiny lines to keep the buzz going works. 50mg lines are enough to boost you back up to the peak! Do 250mgs parachuted, then 50mg lines - works like a charm IMO.

haha yes yes! mid 90's is right, they cost bout 15 when I started on em.....7up's, california sunrises! some of these batches were mad trippy....I was walking in the Q club in brum, and in some glass double doors infront of me in the corridor the glass panes, i saw my reflection, but i was wearing different clothes and i was just motionless in the reflection....then i looked at a friend, his eyes kaleidoscoped out to form fly's eyes and he started talking in a buzzy fly's voice, also i was walking through the crowd with my mate, so i thought, i was following him for a while. he stopped, turned to me, but, it wasnt my mate, though i swore it was him, fuck it was him!! but it wasn't (WTF)....that is the main effects of the MDA i remember whilst still having a rushy buzz but not as much as MDMA. Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: geedogg on June 12, 2012, 11:30 am
Quote from: shiznit on June 12, 2012, 07:45 am
fucking shit! coke has gone up 10fold in pommyland. used to get an oz for 1100-1300 quid. coke was fucking pure ass peru shit. you know the stuff... 5 people in a room, 25 conversations going on ;D

whatz ganja go for now, we used to get mad hydro from the dam for 120quid an oz. but then lost that contact and paid 150 an oz.

Ha fuck, it's 200 an oz of high grade bud....all grown in UK nowadays. There is still import from dam but not as much. I used to pay 110 an oz for white widow or northern lights etc ~ year 2000....compressed import. Pollen for 1000 a KG.(used to sell that) so that has gone up phenomenally but coke actually there is like a three tiered system for coke in UK now. Premium, Mid & Low. The premium is like prices in the 80's-90's but as the coke got cheaper and less pure, it has now created a new surge of premium but you pay through the nose for it (pun intended!) though people will pay it coz the shit stuff is not even worth doing now. I think the same will happen to heroin in the UK now too....Its got worse n worse for years that now people would pay higher prices for premium gear....I'll wait to see what happens with that one but it would make sense right? based on the coke situation....like a correction of the market.

How can people say Benzos are euphoric? I've got a crate of Bud waiting to be drank but Benzos on their own are shit. I've got 30mgs of Valium in my system and I'm tired... that's it.
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Raoul Duke on June 12, 2012, 01:21 pm
nah i'm not big on benzos on their own. i do like a valium if i'm coming down the day after a roll though, it's just nice not having to smoke an eighth of skunk to get that monged - one little pill does it for you :)
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: sollemnis on June 12, 2012, 01:27 pm
Yeah, they're useful for stim comedowns, always pop 10mgs of Valium after a night out on Drone. Speaking of which, I'm glad people are finally interested in it!

My advice RD for drone is to rail 100-150mgs, should give you an intense rush. Pure euphoria... I love it, most euphoric stimulant I've had. IT IS however fiendish... But I think that's the unwashed Drone.

Lims drone is meant to be double acetone washed to take away the fiendish nature of the drug  :)

If you prefer to take things orally (Think I've seen you post that you prefer taking MD orally rather than nasally) then bomb 250mgs in a rizla paper or tissue. You will be feeling king of the world  :)
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Raoul Duke on June 12, 2012, 01:41 pm
it's ONLY mandy i prefer bombing because it just doesn't work up the hooter. don't know why, it just never has - tried all sorts of shit - racked up ridiculously huge lines, up each nostril, mixed with water and snorted the solution (makes you feel like you're drowning) and it just stings, no buzz at all. it works as a 'top up' if i'm already rolling, but just doesn't get me from sober. perfectly happy sticking, coke, H and K up there, and they all do what they're supposed to, just not mandy. so that'll be where the meph's going :) 100mg? does it sting?

looking forward to giving it a go now actually, it never really appealed to me before but now i've read more into it, and basically how 'hell yeah' it is, i'm getting quite excited. Lim's meph was actually next on my list of purchases along, with some of Dutchies coke.

Title: Re: Chat more shit

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: sollemnis on June 12, 2012, 01:53 pm
That's weird, MDMA nasally hit me like a ton of bricks. I actually vomited from the drip though - disgusting. Prefer to take it orally for that reason,  I wrap it in two rizlas to make sure sure the taste doesn't hit me.

100mgs is a good starting dose yeah, especially if the Meph is decent. Then just do 50mg lines to keep the buzz going every 30 mins or so. Thing with Meph is that you can re-dose loads of times before you lose the peak effects. Every time you come down, 50mgs and boom your back up to where you were. It does string a little, but only the first line, once it kicks in the other lines don't sting much at all. The sting isn't that bad anyway, its no where near as bad as 2c-b... just a little sting that lasts 10 secs. With 2c-b your nose is hurting for fucking ages lol.

Hope you have fun on it anyway man, its a fun drug. Rushy, euphoric, makes you talkative, people are amazing and your appreciation of music goes through the roof.

Speaking of blowjobs, I haven't had one in months. Anyone care to help me out here?  ;)

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: redalloverthelandguyhere on June 13, 2012, 03:39 am
Wondering what drugs to do this weekend!

Also, think I better change the sheets on my bed.

One more thing, I got a pal who is going to be vending here!

I have tasted his wares for 25 years plus. Specialty is a 'go to guy' for hash and bud when nobody else had any!

Also he used to sell coke in the 80s. Not touched coke for 15 years as that drug was his Achilles Heel. His word is that the best coke in the UK is now just the few kilos people bring back. the bigger 'gangs' who deal in weight cannot resist mixing the coke. All clevr coke users wash their coke these days and have since the 90s when things went downhill fast as more and more 'street gangs' took to selling coke. The only way to make it cheap enough to sell in very poor areas is to obviously cut it down to hell.

Many kids raised on UK street coke are clueless about drugs in general. In an era of information tecnology you would think all drug users would educate themselves on the drugs they use. We done this when teenagers. Searched for the books on growing cannabis. Books written by old hippies which were laughed at until you actually tasted the results. Made even the best foreign imported weed seem like moldy tasteless seedy third rate smoke.

As for talking shit one of the guys on work is telling us how he dropped 120 mg of MDMA off SR and was dancing by the jukebox along with 5 other lads. Jumping up and down in a giant mass man hug. lol. A table full of glasses of coke and orange! The pub did not mind as we will be back full of speed and that shit makes you drink a lot!

And you love talking shit on speed also!

So I will come here when I test out some speed and say hello or fuck this world , depending on quality  ;)

Good thread.

Hey, I wonder is there a God?

lol

Laters

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: sollemnis on June 13, 2012, 08:21 pm

Google's stuff is nice, rice grain crystals... railed 100mgs of it and it treated me nicely. Ended up polishing off the whole gram throughout the course of the day though, but that's Meph for you.
Did 100mgs, 30 mins later another 100, then decided to go full on and rail 200mgs an hour after that. Blew my face off I'm telling ya. Unless you're experienced with Meph, like me stick to 100mg lines lol. Or if you want a really intense rush do 150mgs.

Yeah I've got a sample coming from him and 40BTC's in my account. If his Meph is the pre-ban that I remember I'm defo ordering 2G's.

What doses do you do? Normally I do 100--150mg lines. Did a 200mg line on Thursday though... that's what happens to me on Meph. I started out with doing 100mgs, 30 mins later another 100mgs. Then an hour later thought FUCK THIS and railed 200mgs, 100mg up each nostril. Telling you what mate, hit me like a ton of bricks.

Yeah, I find it hard to stop moving too. I do find Meph relaxing in its own way. Gives me an overwhelming desire to listen to music! But I find myself going for a fag every 15 mins because I can't sit down any longer  ;D.

Makes me horny too, but no girlfriend at the moment, so you know... I don't get the pleasure of having sex on Drone  :(.

Post by: geedogg on June 13, 2012, 09:35 pm
uurrggghhhh white lightning!!! lol never again kid!!!! poppies grow on wasteland all over the UK!! they grow at my work even!!!! funny as fuck...im eyein up poppies n everyones like....wtf is he doing?? lol i extract using the samurai gecko tek using dried pods from holland....they are the big ones!!! got opium stains on the shell of the pods n everythin! easy extraction too...as for Meth.....hmmmmm i have mixed feelings on it really....It feels like you've smoked crack for hours n you'ree pranged to fuck! it's speed basically n u cant sleep and hitting the pipe takes a minute to master but i got it by watchin a video off here.....It does rush you to fuck but i was really sick once as i had been smokin bud n herion in the day and i wasa sick as a dog!!! i didnt find it to be sociable, i was chatty, but only with close friends who were smokin it with me. I wont buy it again to be honest but im glad i tried it, but i really dont see what the major hype is about on that...apparently, DubG has the best shit the world can offer too....

I wont buy it again to be honest but im glad i tried it, but i really dont see what the major hype is about on that...apparently, DubG has the best shit the world can offer too....

Damn bruv wish i had the dilemma of what to spend 40 coins on!! lol id go pick n mix!!! lol

If it doesn't taste like shit like our white cider does then good for you pal! Budweiser is quite expensive, but I love it.

My 16th was shit! All I did was go for an Indian and smoked a fat joint. Used 3 Rizla kings to make it! Was a 3 sheeter! But I don't like weed anyway, but it was the only drug I could get my hands on that day. Weed makes me too anxious and paranoid to be honest. I prefer stims... a gram of Coke would have done be good, fuck the Indian and do the Coke! But I had no choice  :(.

White lightening is rank, so is White ace, White storm and bla bla the rest of them. Gotta admit though, at 16 when I drank a 3 ltr bottle of white cider it got me smasheeeeed. After the first few swigs the taste wasn't so bad. But even thinking about the taste of White Cider makes my stomach turn.

Yeah I'm strongly considering Meth, would a few Valiums help with the sleep? I guess if I'm considering trying Meth I'm going to have to be prepared to go without sleep. Speed is bad enough for my sleep, no matter what time I take it, I can't sleep to save my life!

"geedogg, yeah, 100mgs then topping up with 50mgs is what I advised RD to do. It's what you should do, despite knowing this I tend to go overboard on it! You know you're one immature bastard when you decide to rail 200mgs. Did 100mgs, 30 mins later, another 100mgs, then BAM 200mgs an hour later. 100 in each nostril. Don't do it mate, the rush is INTENSE, especially since I already had Meph in my system.

As for 4-MEC, I hate that shit. Bought a gram of sonic drone and it was 4-mec or 4-emc or something shitty. Got a buzz but barely any euphoria! Stay away from that dude/

@cryLOTT, yes you can, but its hard if you haven't tried proper Meph for ages. 4-MEC gives you a buzz, but not much euphoria or as much music appreciation as Meph does. Google's product is a banger too, rice grain crystal, obviously not as good as Lim's pre-ban but it's proper good quality Meph.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: cryLOTT on June 13, 2012, 10:51 pm
It wasn't so much the urge to redose, although it always happened. It's that there didn't seem to be a natural closure to the whole experience, when you feel like it was drawing to a close, like with mandy, the redose is never as good, and soon you're heading home. Even charlie is the same. With meph, it was just like a switch for me, until I'm too fucked up to turn it off.

That seems like a pretty well organised 16th, mine consisted of a 2:1 mix of K to MD, and a crowd of people taking advantage of my new found generosity with gear.

Any of you have any funny stories of when you were stoned? Once went in to school stoned, didn't go in till lunch time, been doing a session all morning. 5th period I got pulled out of class because I wasn't wearing my tie (yeah we had to wear blazers, a shirt and tie in our school) and I couldn't stop laughing. Gave me the giggles badly, was just laughing my bollocks off whilst getting bollocked, got sent to the head of department and was put in isolation for it! Just chilled in that room all daaaaaay.

Damn I miss school, pure banter with the teachers. I'm 21 now and still haven't fully matured  ::)

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: geedogg on June 18, 2012, 10:26 am
Quote from: Knomo on June 18, 2012, 10:19 am
Whats heroin like?
I always hear these horror stories about if you use it once it'll get you hooked and all that crap, it is nonsense, right? :P

Yeah it is obviously false that if you take a substance for the first time you are immediately hooked....thats the same for ANY drug i've ever taken...
BUT!!!!! and its a big but.....it is PHYSICALLY addictive....which means you really have to be careful with that shit!!! I started too young and was naive, I had heard all the bullshit aboutdrugs and found out that it wasnt true so i thought, why wpould heroin be any different?? im smart, i wont get hooked!!! fuckin 15 yrs later im still doin it and i only just got out of full time addiction 2-3 yts ago!!!
If you like to take drugs at least once a day or evry other day....be VERY careful if you choose to try H. It is the one drug that the stories dont lie about!!!
That said, I so know people who use once a month or every couple of weeks so it can be done, i just have an addictive personality.

I've always wondered about people biggin up a vendors shit but they're from the EU n the vendor in question says they dont ship outside US/CAN?? Re-shippers? That's very trusting isn't it!? haha

Yeah sorry missed what you were asking Knomo dude!! Its like a dreamy state, things are heavy, you cant keep ya eyes open and as RD said...'whatever' all ur cares go away and it is very moreish!! u end up not using all ur bag, so next day, you have a bit more, then u quite likes that so u get a little more in a couple of days...before you know it you have used 5 days in 7 as it is a fucking nice drug!!!
It brings you down nicely off ANY stimulant when its time to go to bed after a mad one....i fuckin love it....but also i have to respect it.
 all the people that go to hospital n go on bout ''morphine is so great!! i was cranking that magic morphine button to fuck!!'' in the UK they use Heroin in hospitals...diacetylmorphine is heroin and this is the 'morphine' you get administered. of course they would never tell this to the patients as they would freak out but its amazing when you take away the stereotypes how people feel about substances.

oh plus im goin cloud surfer i think for my coke later in month....expensive aint they tho at minute!! n there is a french vendor shipping grams of opium...it says its 'pharma quality opium' so i think that may mean cooked, not raw. it says u can smoke it so i would hope so. might do another pod extraction next weekend....

It's #3 remember, so it does not snort as well as #4 (But it runs on foil) I had a friend that used to snort #3 all the time though...

@RD, yes he has it, here you go http://silkroadvb5piz3r.onion/silkroad/item/2baebc3409.

It's a lot better, the drip isn't vile with pre ban, you get an intense need for fluid, its speedier, and its sand like crystals. Not shitty powder, or 'rice grain' crystal. Googles product was nice, was the 'rice grain' crystal drone but he's stopped listing 1G's for some reason.

Start of with 100mgs, straight up the shnozzer, you'll be feeling it pretty fast, then just do 50mg top ups every 20-30 min to keep the buzz going.

Wow is all I can say. Today the 'combo' was Mephedrone + M1 + H. Well sort of a combo. I snorted 100mgs of drone and 100mgs of M1, felt fantastic. Then railed up a 150mg line of drone an hour later, and parachuted another 100mgs of M1.  As I left the peak I stupidly (Yeah I'm aware mixing Stims with Depressants is a bad idea) snorted 15mgs of H.

I couldn't wait any longer... And wow, I'm feeling REALLY REALLY relaxed, and the funny thing is, the H hasn't taken away any of the effects of the M1/Drone, still got music appreciation and the euphoria.

I'd imagine this similar to a speedball (Coke and H) Minus the music appreciation.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: gtgeorgz on June 22, 2012, 01:24 pm
I don't know about it myself but this is copied from another part of the forum, in the 'MDMA Safety' thread, interesting stuff!:
Quote from: SteveyMcBobbyPants on June 22, 2012, 04:11 am
A lot of people suggest 5-HTP for the comedown but that shit isn't good for your heart. Sure, some of it crosses your blood-brain barrier and gets converted into serotonin. Most of it, though, gets converted into serotonin by your liver which is very bad for your heart. If you want to increase your levels of serotonin (which in turn decreases any, albeit small, risk of neurotoxicity), take an l-Tryptophan supplement after rolling. l-Tryptophan is also a primary precursor to serotonin but it is only converted into serotonin after it has safely crossed the blood-brain barrier, not in the liver.

Honestly, go roll your tits off. Your body will tell you if you're overdoing it.
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: geedogg on June 22, 2012, 01:48 pm

I don't know about it myself but this is copied from another part of the forum, in the 'MDMA Safety' thread, interesting stuff!:
Quote from: SteveyMcBobbyPants on June 22, 2012, 04:11 am
A lot of people suggest 5-HTP for the comedown but that shit isn't good for your heart. Sure, some of it crosses your blood-brain barrier and gets converted into serotonin. Most of it, though, gets converted into serotonin by your liver which is very bad for your heart. If you want to increase your levels of serotonin (which in turn decreases any, albeit small, risk of neurotoxicity), take an l-Tryptophan supplement after rolling. l-Tryptophan is also a primary precursor to serotonin but it is only converted into serotonin after it has safely crossed the blood-brain barrier, not in the liver.

Honestly, go roll your tits off. Your body will tell you if you're overdoing it.

Yeah, there is actually a very easy way to get round this and get shit into Australia which I am surprised that you fuckers haven't thought of yet. If you know anything about chemistry think logically about it.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on June 26, 2012, 06:57 am
LOL fair play, then I shall give you this one as a freebie. :P

When you make a drug there often several way to synthesize it, these paths are called "Synthetic Routes". No no doubt that the Australian government has all the regular precursors for things like, let's say MDMA and Meph already banned which indeed they do so that rules out importing them to make the shit domestically because it will get stopped at customs. How do we get round this? Simple. You design new synthetic routes from unregulated precursors so that you can import/buy them (vast majority of the time you can buy everything domestically anyway) and make it from scratch from them instead. Boom. Beat the system. :D

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on June 26, 2012, 10:41 am
No never. As I say because I see drug as just a commodity it just feels like you are bringing something that in my eyes shouldn't be part of that world into it so I never did drugs/dealt with them around any of my Ex's. Got pissed with her and went out clubbing and that with them but everything else was kept completely compartmentalized and hidden from view.

Obviously I realize that not everyone subscribes to this outlook on it but it's not just a "It's a Man's world" thing, it's also because I don't want drugs to be involved in every aspect of my life because I don't think it's very healthy for you mentally. So yeah, in short it keeps me sane and gives me something to escape to when work is a stress.

But fair play, ever seen someone on steroids and coke be polite to a boss? One of the guys we have is a body builder and has assaulted people for imagined injustices. Last year it was the manager of a take-a-way who got the order wrong. guy laughed on the phone so the beefhead drives ten mins and jumps over the counter. Lucky he took compensation and decided to drop charges. Amazing what a couple of grand will do to ease a bruised face.

But what can you do? Known the guy for years. Plus we all know its silly to wind people up when you do not know them as there is always someone who will punch you eventually.

Post by: redalloverthelandguyhere on June 28, 2012, 12:06 am
I am feeling good as me and the missus are off for a weekend of fun and frivolity.
 
I got some coke off one of the guys to wash and it turns out to be 40% loss - 20% or so was a waxy yellow shit that I got from sesampinos coke.

A few of the lads used, they looked like it was good gear and even the boss took a line and said he would get some if we washed it.

I got given a 'little sniff'' for washing, turns out to be just under 500mg so Mrs Red is happy.

I am spoilt for choice, but may settle for beer and weed only.

As for AA - I got a bad coke off him, bad speed, plus valium that kept you awake ::)

Got an E also - a 'real E'. Pill reports backs it up as being legit but I prefer crystal and thank SR for that as it was not easy to get in my remote neck of the woods.

Got some Modafinil, might be handy for some conference I got to go to on safety.

Who saw the game tonight? Spain looked ordinary until ET then they showed flair.

England are shit.

Germany I would say will win this but we will see.

Oh, I will take some MDMA with me as we got some club Mrs Red wants to visit. Her on coke, me on E, lol - could be interesting.

Hello to anyone out there.

And is the 'fucking awesome shit' really good? (the coke off Sugar Daddy Mr P - I joke)

He done the right thing and refunded all who bought the sugar. Well, at least anyone with 50 grams has enough sugar to cook exactly 16 fairy cakes.

Good to see honest vendors with good coke!

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 02, 2012, 05:51 pm
Quote from: gtgeorgz on July 02, 2012, 05:35 pm
Quote from: Limetless on July 02, 2012, 04:43 pm
For all those interested, the new batch of Meph goes into production on Weds,

is that going to be the Pre-Ban meph production or just your normal stuff? :)

It's going to be the isomer I had in previously (the white powder that had a slightly different euphoria) only this time I should have it in crystallized form (hopefully).

It's basically the second best type you can get. Very euphoric but it leans more towards an MD euphoria. Once we have upgraded our equipment and can get the right precursors in I can do the Pre-Ban isomer and make it like what it was. Interestingly enough there is a way around this by flipping the isomer using stereochemistry but, as anyone who knows what stereochem is, that shit is fucking SOLID to do.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 02, 2012, 06:33 pm
Quote from: Green on July 02, 2012, 06:26 pm
Shit man. The chemistry of these drugs is quite interesting when you break it all down and look at each element of the chemical. Before i came here I didn't give a fuck, but now I find myself wanting to learn about isomers and such.

Yeah, it is quite interesting and very complex. Here are a few pointers -

The difference in isomers effect pharmaological profile and/or potency because one isomer in most cases binds to the receptors easier/more completely than another.

In the case of some drugs (specifically the caine family) one isomer will give 0 effects and only 1 will.

If you look at Mephedrone molecular structure it's almost identical to MDMA's. :)

@ George, save some of the Bing and do it in a line with the Meph.....you wont regret it. ;)

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 02, 2012, 09:21 pm
Lol, I just wrote the best fuck-off ever lol. It's in response to the first message I got sent -

Dear Sir or Madam of the FBI/DEA/SOCA/HMRC/IRS or whatever other agency monitors this place.

Although you have not formally requested it I am going to have to give you a tutorial in how to speak to me without raising my suspicions because I am afraid whatever training the U.S or U.K government has not served you very well. In fact when I see attempts like this (which I do fairly frequently) it makes me often wonder if the tax payers funds were intentionally wasted on you as some sort of interdepartmental joke or that the higher echelons of law enforcement really is incapable of finding any halfway talented investigators in the 21st century. If it is a case of the former, I am sorry to hear that you are the punch-line of the office joke, if it is the latter then I can certainly see why the U.S and U.K has a deficit at the moment and shame on you for exasperating the financial ills we are suffering today.

I shall begin this lesson by asking you if you think I am particularly stupid? Given the fact I manage to deal drugs, launder money and other things that you would class as a crime under your very nose and get away with it I don't think sending me a message from an account that has absolutely no feedback with the tones and lexicon that you have decided to use is going to get you very far really? It dismays me that simply because you were most likely college educated and that you deem yourself to hold the moral ground that you think I would be some sort of stereotypically cretinous oaf that you might see being arrested in the street on a weekend. You need to A) work on your subtlety. B) work on your linguistics C) Stop trying to catch "Criminals" by reading a handbook. You will be much better off if you used the brain you were born with to think outside the box and find alternate solutions rather than rehashing the same ineffective tactics you seem to employ time and again.

Finally, you may think that just because you find it extremely difficult to apprehend the members of SR that you can go for the financial jugular and catch us through these means and by trying to access my services you could learn how the laundering processes work and thus catch myself and others that use it red handed. You are mistaken here because you think I would be flippant about who I would take on as my clients, whilst I may work with those I can vet and be sure are trustworthy I shan't be considering working with any member of the Alphabet-Mafia and this stance will not change.

Thank you for your clumsy attempt at trying to sting me, it was most humorous.

Sincerely

Limetless

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Knomo on July 02, 2012, 10:21 pm
You should read this crazy article I found tonight :P


Lolquote:

Quote
So cocaine was systematically tested on soldiers? Yeah, by Theodor Aschenbrandt, a German scientist. In his 1883 report Die psychologische Wirkung und Bedeutung des Cocain he described how cocaine increased German soldiers' stamina, and how it decreased their hunger and fear and that the stuff made them get worked up much easier. In short: it made them better soldiers. Right. After that, I found clear evidence of the Dutch Cocaine Factory selling cocaine to all parties during the war in a pharmaceutical weekly. Everybody from the British, the Germans, the French to the Canadians. There were many countries involved in that war and millions of soldiers from all over were fighting in the trenches. Neutral Netherlands supplied coke to all of those countries. This a bizarre fact and a dirty piece of Dutch history that was more or less covered up. It's not as if they teach this in school. Nope. The Netherlands made unbelievable amounts of money of trading during the war. They emerged from World War I as the richest country, together with the United States. But it's been kept out of the history books.

http://www.vice.com/read/holland-was-the-worlds-biggest-coke-manufacturer

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: hoffa on July 03, 2012, 05:39 am
Ok before I start I need to disclose I am high, but nothing I am about to say is untrue! (In my eyes anyway)
So blew work off today because I thought meh fucking bullshit o'clock Skype call so fuck it. Fams away house to myself.
Sorry Lim there is no pornography attached to this story. ;)
Anyway nice day decide to sit outside with my 40oz (still in brown paper) life is good. Then without any notice I catch a glimpse on the other side of the road, this bright fluorescent yellow green flash. I immediately spring into action as I know it is my beloved postie who in recent times has not been giving me the "attention" I deserve, if you know what I mean! (Once again Lim there is no sexual innuendo or undertone)
I start walking toward the road ready to cross over when I notice, he has stopped delivering mail and his little legs are smashing those pedals like there is no tomorrow. The paranoid Hoffa quickly interjects and asserts "he is avoiding you mate" I dismiss this accusation on the account that I am high and potentially drunk. Besides I have always been nice to him. 6 pack for Xmas easter eggs even an out of the blue thank you. How can this be? My worst fear starts to unravel, he is avoiding me. I'm not sure if it was his turning his head completely away, or the no response when I called out his name, but it became abundantly clear his legs was pumping like no lazy son bitch postie has ever done. Desperate, confused, hurt even. I don't know what came over me but involuntary movements started to occur. My hand reached down and grabbed a rock and at that very moment (with my hand on my heart) I heard the loudest snap I have ever heard. Little did I realize that snap occured in my brain.
Now I'm not bragging but fuck I can throw a rock. I kid you not the rock has left my hand and with precision of a sushi chef has guided its way through the atmosphere and nailed this cunt fair and square on the back of his helmet. I cant tell you if it was planned, or luck I like to think of it as fate. Because all his peddling and ignoring added up to sweet fuck all right at that moment. Yes friends he wobbled for maybe a split second before the inevitable finally occured. Sideways he fell, not to the soft grassy side, rather the warm reality of black bitumen. Epic is the only reasonable word I can use to capture this once in a lifetime event.
So there it is Joe the postie lying on the road, most likely bleeding from the graze, and me frozen in a daze wondering why I make a choice to help him or to run away.
Everyone of my instincts told me he is human and you have to do the right thing. Why I was slowly walking backwards I cannot explain. But as every second passed, I found myself further and further away from the scene of carnage.
With what must have been his last gasp of air, he releases an almighty HOFFA.
Now I need to remind you that I am stoned and quite certainly drunk so again I am finding it hard to explain my thought processes.
After hear my name load and certainly clear, I then question if he mistakenly assumed I did the damage as he is clearly in a state of concussion. As it slowly dawns on me I have no other alternative but to start the long walk toward this poor fellow, erratic thoughts continue to infiltrate my head. Like what if I hit him again and knock him out and let someone else find him. Or fuck it he started this whole situation by yelling racial obscenities at me. Or and the one I am most ashamed of. I was pursuing him because he stole something from my house, what I don't know but to Christ I was going to plant it on him.
The moment of truth finally arrives and without opening my mouth to say a word, poor bleeding Joe whispers, Hoffa man I need your help, I look deep into his eyes and I swear for a quick moment I glimpsed into his sole and realized what only a person in my state could comprehend. Nice innocent Joe is also as stoned as a cunt!
I didn't know if I should laugh or cry but I heard myself yelling at him for being so irresponsible, and telling him that he could have killed someone. Random and sometimes incoherent jabber was coming out of my mouth, the adrenaline is being released, I am off the hook. I slowly started to calm myself when a warm feeling started to come over me and the realization started to appear, a moment of clarity even. I had to ask, Joe where have you been scoring your gear from. I looked him straight in the eye and even though no words were spoken, a lifetime of understanding was established. I knew and he knew he is a stealing cunt and that from this day onward he will personally ensure my mail always arrives. And given the fact I know and he knows I know and other "lost" letter should also come my way into the foreseeable future.

Well there you have it friends my one day off was filled with so much emotion that I truely need to sob in a corner for what I have experienced has now confirmed to me the slow postie dudes are very very cunning until you choose to pick up your rock! I vote we all pick up rocks in protest as quite clearly these cunts are getting stoned on OUR coin!

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: kryptoz on July 03, 2012, 06:10 pm
Alright what the fuck; me venting below

So I do a proof for a customer, he was pretty rude (commanding me to do things, demanding that it be done exactly like this, etc) and I'm used to that so I go along with it I'm like whatever finish it quick so I can get the douche off my back. Sent this like 2-3 weeks ago and never got a reply back, no notice of vacation, nothing. So I pretty much forgot all about it. Next thing I know, about 5 minutes ago he calls my office demanding to speak to a manager, complaining about how it was nothing like he said he wanted (even though I wrote down what he said on the phone word for word and put it in the folder with his proof, dumbass ::)), so my manager comes running up to me like dafuq. So I just rushed through his proof again, and the last thing he said when I called to tell him the proof was done was:

"You're horrible at your job and you should just quit now"

I'm just sitting here bewildered at the fact that he thinks I actually care for his opinion, and that he can just flat out lie to the manager to get a free print (company policy, its moronic but my boss won't change it). The only reason I'm pissed is because of how stupid the whole situation is and now I'm in shit for not even doing anything

The only reason I'm pissed is because of how stupid the whole situation is and now I'm in shit for not even doing anything

Title: Re: Chat more shit

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: diskoking23 on July 05, 2012, 08:37 am
The salts don't stay hot for long... They turn from a crystal to a powder in the oven, your just trying to take the moisture out, so medium oven for a couple of hours.. Keep moving it about every 20 min or so (I've burnt it before!)

Works a treat!

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Knomo on July 05, 2012, 08:48 am
You can use a coffee filter and another glass to pour the acetone/cocaine mix in. The caffeine/crap will be dissolved in the acetone so will go through the filter and cocaine stays behind.. Let it drip for a while and than dry it.

5HTP being a serotonin precursor, supposedly raises serotonin levels within the brain, so if you take this for a few days, you will supposedly have higher serotonin levels, if you stop taking this and replace it with the Mephedrone, it should have more serotonin to work with. Hence increasing things like euphoria and well being. People have reported using this technique with MDMA. But its very important to stop taking the 5HTP around 24hrs before you take the substance, otherwise it may negatively interfere with the effects. But this is just a guess, there isn't much information on it, but i will try it on Sunday and feedback :)

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 06, 2012, 11:07 am
Oh and it smells like nail-varnish. So whether or not that means it's been acetone washed or chopped full of base I dunno but it generally means one or t'uther. Also, as far as the packaging goes IMO it's not the best method, the product is gets stuck on the side of the raised edge. IMO it should be in a zippy and then vac-sealed because zippies avoid the need there is now to scratch the surface of the vac-seal for hours on end. Ballache.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 06, 2012, 11:21 am

I bought 5g yeah. It's a bit more numbing than I expected it to be but that is minor really. On the + side though the onset is nice and quick and also it doesn't make me skittish like when I did 3 lines of Dutchaans. If Pfand is getting his product from Dutchaan (which I am assuming is the case but is really none of anyone's concern when it comes down to it) this is certainly some of the better stuff I have had that has come from Dutchaan. If this standard remains I shall certainly be a regular customer. :)

Have to say that I'm very pleased to say that I can tuck my doubts to bed. Verrrrry nice. :)

On a different note to all those that have messaged me sorry I haven't answered but as you know I'm busy in the kitchen at the moment with you know what. I will definitely come on and answer all mail either tonight or maybe tomorrow. Sorry if it urgent but I am super busy at this current time.

spot on mate, couldn't have put it better myself

Yeah I mean like I say I don't mean my samples (obvs lol, that would be slightly counterproductive) because I do that stuff for good vibes and marketing/TRs or other ESTABLISHED vendors. I mean yeah crack on with that (although personally I wouldn't ask for a sample off a vendor if he was running a group, I don't approve of vendors asking like that) but new guys? Fuck that riggggght off man. I mean I get sketched if I'm ASKED for samples from people I dunno and always say no unless it was a vendor I may do business with in the future but that would be ONLY if I knew them well. I dunno if any of you remember when I first arrived on the Road (all of 3 months ago, seems like years lol!) but I did my samples as listings and I charged postage for them purposefully to look legit. I did do a thread on here as well but I made it clear nothing was totally free.

IMO nothing in life comes for free so anyone that is new and offers samples for free on here I always jump straight to the "Hmmm dunno about that" stance straight away. This is especially for things like Heroin, Cocaine, MDMA, LSD and the ultra-hype drugs.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 06, 2012, 04:01 pm
Quote from: Raoul Duke on July 06, 2012, 03:53 pm
Got 0.52 back after washing 0.65 :)

Now that my friend, is not bad. That makes it exactly 80% not counting any Amphetamine it is cut with. I also doubt it's chopped with much Amph (if it is at all) because for one, I have done enough to feel it and I fucking HATE Amph and I wouldn't be feeling as good as I do and secondly you can tell when it is cut with Amph by the texture because it GENERALLY (of course, not always) it looks like it has ACTUAL glitter in it and it doesn't taste/feel Amphy either IMO. I would say if it does have Amph in it would be very low purity Amph and it would be only maybe 5-10% at the most. Saying that though it doesn't make sense fiscally to add Amph as a cut but at those small amounts.

Anyway, that's my opinion, anyone else care to speculate?

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: LiberPater on July 06, 2012, 08:45 pm
Quote from: diskoking23 on July 06, 2012, 12:18 pm
I'm a grown man... You think I'd have learned that you don't get something for nothing! - I think I've learned that lesson now!
I don't know what you mean, but I shipped your sample using the same kind of package as the others, vacuum sealing the coke twice, using the same amount of postal seals for other European countries.

Many other orders arrived in other European countries and USA.

For my first batch of paid-goods, I do not ask anybody to FE and I PM everybody to remember them to extend the escrow time and do not auto-finalize.

I didn't ship for "nothing". I shipped to test if there is something wrong.with my package, to get some feedback before start selling and to know the expected time.

Actually, it was not only 2 samples that never arrived, but the other customers never manifested, and I always keep my customer complete privacy if they don't wanna expose that they made business with me. No details, even the country, if they don't wanna expose himself.

I really shipped your free-sample. If it never arrived, sorry, I don't know what happened, but it was not my fault.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: LiberPater on July 06, 2012, 09:15 pm
Quote from: diskoking23 on July 06, 2012, 08:54 pm
No problem LiberPater... When we were chatting earlier, we were not talking about you!! I know you send it dude! (There was a scammer offering samples and trying to blackmail people!)
Hopefully this next one will arrive... I've got faith in your skills mate! Just less faith in the Brazilian Correos!!
Ok.

I don't like Correios too and Brazilian public companies are usually untrustful. Today I found that they do not check every street mailbox everyday, in other words, your letter can stay days totally stopped in the mailbox before the correios get the letter. Than, depending where you are, they ship to another city, than to another city (Brazil is a giant country), than to your country and just than to your city.

It's not good for me too. Faster my customer get the stuff, faster I'll get the money, but I can't do anything about it and never lied about shipping time.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 07, 2012, 09:39 pm
Hahaha RD so what did you think overall? Giving Meph the nod or the shake of head? Curious and I like to get peoples honest opinions on the drug as a whole.

As to feeling special the morning after, generally speaking, people either suffer on Meph or find it easy-peasy. I used to fluctuate depending on circumstance but now I only feel terrible if I march on past the 36-48 hour mark. A full 24 hour day bender is fuck all to me now. People generally get used to it and become accustomed to it. I been doing it since 2008 so it's fair to say I had a fair bit of time to adjust lol.....

Oh and I am answering all messages now, got nearly 100 to do....ballache....

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Raoul Duke on July 08, 2012, 10:32 am
Morning all. Feeling special again this morning. Finished that coke last night, The mrs actually had a couple of lines :) first time in ages, she was funny as fuck rabbiting absolute bollocks

Yeah lim I do like that meph, got a couple of gripes with it though - I've got to do like 200mg lines to get anything off it and it fucking destroys my nose. Got about 200mg left after last night, think I'm gonna bomb it to save the hooter.  dunno how you do so much of it because it has fucking ruined my nose. Don't give me that much of a comedown either, but I don't think I can really tell cos of the booze hangover.

Few days of rest now - my body had taken a right hammering the last 2 days. Yesterday alone I did 6 pints of stella, a bottle of red and finished off just under half bottle of whisky.

Just about to do a big fry up now - best cure for hangover known to man, some nice greasy fried bread and a shit load of bacon and sausages :)

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Knomo on July 08, 2012, 10:31 pm
Man I should really start understanding this GPG encryption stuff.. I feel such a noob without it :-[
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: ilovelsd69 on July 08, 2012, 10:55 pm
Quote from: Knomo on July 08, 2012, 10:31 pm
Man I should really start understanding this GPG encryption stuff.. I feel such a noob without it :-[

What you don't understand ? They are public and private keys, the seller give you his public key and you encrypt your address with it. With his private key he is able to decrypt it. You never gave out your private key. This is the same if you want him to send you encrypted message but you gave out your public key to him and he will then encrypt the message with it and you decrypt it with your private key.
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Knomo on July 08, 2012, 11:06 pm
So basically, I save the private key from the vendor in my GPG keychain and write a message (using a textwriting program? Just any? ), encrypt it with his public key and send the encrypted message to him.. ?

That doesn't sound too difficult.. :P
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Knomo on July 08, 2012, 11:08 pm
Could you PM me your public key and see if I can encrypt a message for you?
Title: Re: Chat more shit

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 10, 2012, 11:24 pm
Quote from: ilovelsd69 on July 10, 2012, 11:14 pm
Quote from: Limetless on July 10, 2012, 11:10 pm

LOOOOOOOOL. 4-EMC/4-MEC and all that shit was what was brought out to replace Mephedrone. Meph is the number 1, any of the other Cathinones (apart from M1) are just try hards.  ;)

What about 4-FA, a-PVP, a-PPP did you know something about these?

Yeah of course, a-PVP and a-PPP are both derivatives of MDPV and and are all in the Cathinone family and all derivatives of it's parent compound Pyrovalerone. 4-FA is an substituted Amphetamine with a flourine group added on the 4th ring position.
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: ilovelsd69 on July 10, 2012, 11:31 pm

It's because it's relatively cheap to produce at this current time. If this were to change it would be a different kettle of fish. The route to make Pre-Ban is a different though because the raw mats are more difficult to get which is another reason why Pre-Ban has faded out at this current time.

I been in this game for years, it made me a animal
It's rules to this shit, I wrote me a manual
A step by step booklet for you to get
your game on track, not your wig pushed back
Rule nombre uno: never let no one know
how much, dough you hold, cause you know
The cheddar breed jealousy 'specially
if that man fucked up, get your ass stuck up
Number two: never let em know your next move
Don't you know Bad Boys move in silence or violence
Take it from your highness (uh-huh)
I done squeezed mad clips at these cats for they bricks and chips
Number three: never trust no-bo-dy
Your moms'll set that ass up, properly gassed up
Hoodie to mask up, shit, for that fast buck
she be layin in the bushes to light that ass up
Number four: know you heard this before
Never get high, on your own supply
Number five: never sell no crack where you rest at
I don't care if they want a ounce, tell em bounce
Number six: that god damn credit, dead it
You think a crackhead payin you back, shit forget it
Seven: this rule is so underrated
Keep your family and business completely seperated
Money and blood don't mix like two dicks and no bitch
Find yourself in serious shit
Number eight: never keep no weight on you
Them cats that squeeze your guns can hold jobs too
Number nine shoulda been number one to me
If you ain't gettin bags stay the fuck from police (uh-huh)
If niggaz think you snitchin ain't tryin listen
They be sittin in your kitchen, waitin to start hittin
Number ten: a strong word called consignment
Strictly for live men, not for freshmen
If you ain't got the clientele say hell no
Cause they gon want they money rain sleet hail snow
Follow these rules you'll have mad bread to break up
If not, twenty-four years, on the wake up
Slug hit your temple, watch your frame shake up
Caretaker did your makeup, when you pass
Your girl fucked my man Jake up, heard in three weeks
she sniffed a whole half of cake up
Heard she suck a good dick, and can hook a steak up
Gotta go gotta go, more pies to bake up, word up, uhh

Title: Re: Chat more shit

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 11, 2012, 05:22 pm
Quote from: hoffa on July 11, 2012, 05:19 pm
I was thinking just heat the plate not the coke, and place the coke onto the hot plate?

No don't even do that mate. In chemistry if the reaction is over (which in this case it has) you do not use heat on a compound because it can make it degrade, you use ventilation to do it so thing extraction fans or the open air. Honestly just trust me on this mate, we made that mistake once and lost half a key of Meph but the principle is the same for all chemicals. Was a sad day.

Also with Cocaine the melting/flashpoint for it is 180 degrees so this is where it burns and is destroyed however that doesn't stop it being hurt at temperatures close to that.

And yeah Knomo we will have to see, like I said Ketamine along with Meph is taking up all my time at the moment but if it's viable I may do Amphetamine. I am not too clued up on Base Amphetamine though, isn't it really dangerous when it's pure or something?

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 12, 2012, 07:16 pm
Yeah you have to perform a reduction on P2NP to make it into straight P2P and then you go from there to make either Amphetamine or Racemic Methamphetamine. I am not sure of the synthesis of either but you can get them just by searching Google. I know the synths themselves are relatively simple though, especially with Amphetamine. I briefly discussed it with the guys I work with and they said I could probably make it work if I had a set of instructions and had the technical jargon explained. I haven't had any training like them but I pick up the basic because I help them out while they do it.

Quote
In the eighteenth century, it was common practice for small groups of well-to-do Southern women to each lift up their corsets and "queef" at their leisure on warm, summer afternoons. Typically performed on balconies or porches, these women would insert various large objects in their TOOTS and slowly pull them out to create the desired sound. These "porch parties" would provide hours of fun for the ladies while the men were away, and, from a practical standpoint, at times, enough air circulation as a respite from the brutal summer heat. Small wagers were often placed with the winner going to longest continuous queef, highest pitch, lowest pitch, smelliest, and wettest. There was also the queef sing-a-long; and a special prize was given to any women whose queef could attract wildlife.

Well I wake up, do a gram line of Meph and Rip (one of each up each nose) then I have a bath and clean my teeth with Rip paste (bout half a g) then I go down stairs and have some MDMA on toast with an Innocent smoothie. Then I just keep doing lines throughout the day and sometimes I do some Ketamine to wash the day away in the evening, normally 12 grams IV.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: diskoking23 on July 14, 2012, 07:09 am
Yeah... Sounds like a lot! My cake I made was 7 grams of trim (Just fan leaves mostly) I found while on a walk... It looked like a factory had been hastily chopped down and there was 20 or so plants just dumped in some local woods! I had no bag on me so stuffed my pockets with leaves.. I did a cannabutter extraction, made a cookie, fucked it up with too much butter, so covered it melted chocolate! (in an 8inch pie dish) Me and wife need a slice no bigger than 2inch squared to be tripped out! First time we took WAY too much (Probably double or triple that amount) Like a slice of cake.. We were FUCKED! The misses seriously started to freak...

Really easy to do the cannabutter extraction though! - I'm gonna do it again when this batch runs out! It's great for a night in with a movie... I don't smoke anymore you see (Was a smoker for 15 years!) - So it's the only feasible ROA for us now!!

Also I can't believe you haven't tried mushies yet TallTemptress, that's insane?! :o They're in my top five without a doubt, nothing else I've tried can make me have as much fun playing with kittens and bubbles than boomers do. Not sure if anyone else agrees, but they give me that childlike mentality as though I were 5 again. There's no better feeling in the world. :))

Nope in fact, there's loads of drugs I haven't tried

I've had these controlled drugs: coke, freebase (don't do this anymore only had it in cigs), weed, hash, speed, MDMA, and E's - Now space cake!

And a few legal highs

But that's it!  ;)

I'm really a coke girl, by nature - It just suits my hyped personality, I'm naturally on a trip so don't need to try any harder!

If I ever feel like wanted to act like a five year old, I'll take a shroom with you Gary, and we'll go and play in the sandpit and swing off the swings together! :)

Okay? :D

You'd be surprised, that's actually a blast to do on shrooms. Seriously, getting really high on a swing set and jumping off feels like you're flying! :D

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: hoffa on July 14, 2012, 09:24 am
OK now you need to understand this is 100% on English Ladies. 97.5 Aussie and no need to use any pick ups for the US chickies.

U stumbled onto this gem when playing the slap game. You know the game when your out with mates and you can't be fucked picking up and your all in the mood for a good laugh. The guy who gets slaped gets a free beer.

Now you might think this sounds easy, I mean say something rude get a slap. Well not so very challenging indeed. One of my mates and if you know him you will defo know this move, so pm me as it don't identify yourself.

So he would walk up to a girl and say "hey what's up" the girl would say hi back. His next message would be "can you hold my beer for a second" no prob was the usual response. He would then proceed to pull down his pants (with no underwear in) and then ask the girl for his beer back, and continue to carry on a conversation as if nothing was wrong. Funny as shit but didn't land him a slap! This eventually became his trade mark move regardless with we were playing the game or not. I guess when you are blessed with a horse Dick your confidence is somewhat higher.

Anyway so this is a bit of background to how the eventual line was born.

So there I was thinking wholly fuck no slap I have got to be more obvious. Not in a take off more clothes sense, as my Willy is far too small for those antics, more in the words I choose. So here I am thinking what to say, go to a fat chick and say, fuck your an ugly fat pig? Na too obvious, and generally the DFF (designated fat friend) that each group of hot friend have, is generally backed up by her possie. So no we need more direct in your face statement, sort of a shock and awe approach which will leave no other alternative than, a slap or potentially worse a knee in the groan. Now a knee in the groan was a much sort after prize as you were then granted free drinks all night.

While deep in thought and at the corner of my eye one mate score success, the slap echoed through the establishment and an almighty raw went up by my group. Eager to understand how he achieved the slap, the victor comes confidently back to proudly to receive his prize and share the story. Now while not subtle he attained the slap by nipple crippling the girl. While laughing with tears rolling down our cheeks and without any notice our victorious mate in the middle of his victory speach is in a headlock being punched and kicked while getting dragged out of the establishment. From that moment rule 1A was born no physical contact aloud. Rule 1B also was announced, mates were to continue to stay at the establishment while the evicted Peron went home.

So my job became increasingly harder as I was thinking easy hand up skirt free drink. But with the inclusion of 1A this is now eliminated. Back on to words. Now I don't know if it was the beer consumed or the sneaky line in the toilets, the solution hit me like sperm into a hookers mouth!

With the strategy confirmed by begin casing the one who I confidently knew would place her beloved hand across my face. While walking through the pack I see what could be the sexist individual surrounded by her crew and of course the DFF I walk up palms sweating the adrenalin pumping and start. "Hey" speaking generally but looking at the hot girl! The DFF starts hey how you doing? A little bit of vomit entered my throat as I replied to this hideous creature, while you are attractive and you probably have the best personality ever. It your friend that has got me this way. An immediate smile appears as I get the entire group on side. As let's face it Hot girls always have a friend that is ugly, they know there ugly, and they will always say when trying to set them up yea she is pretty but her personality yada yada. Anyway with the group allowing me access to this "victim" I start the bullshit bla bla confessing first time I have done this bla bla. The hottie will in almost every case start the education process. Well you start of by buying the girl bla bla and its at that moment when you interject and start the what is now called the line. Listen I can do all that shit but honestly I am here to see if there is any chance? Silence, confusion follows and the alway same reply comes back huh is there any chance of what? And now the moment I have been waiting for and to claim my prized free drink from the boys. I lean over look straight in her eyes and say. "Listen you know it and I definitely know it, women like to fuck! So my question is let's cut all the bullshit do you want to fuck"

With jaws clenched in anticipation she (and instead of violence) whisper back "but whay will I tell my friends"

So there you have it, this is an absolute true story of how this line was born and as I have said it has been used on many an english backpacker. And numerous hot women with so much success it really is ridiculous. I honestly kid you not. I challenge anyone to come back and say bullshit after they have tried it. I can also disclose O0 will 100% vouch for this. Do it but use this wisely!

My secrete is now passed to thee......

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Knomo on July 17, 2012, 07:53 pm
The only time I started a resolution it did not mess with my stats. Basically when you start a resolution you first make a offer to the vendor, say 100% refund. If he doesn't respond to that within 3 days or so, a SR staff member steps in and checks your story.

So what you want to do is to elaborate what happened in the resolution center best you can and hope for the best.

When I think about it I think that when a SR staff member refunds your money it doesn't mess with your score, but when a vendor refunds it does.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 18, 2012, 11:11 pm
Lol Cap you will make a killing on that.

And DOC has some effects similar to LSD but it's part of the Amphetamine family so it also has some of the features of that family too, hence it being a Psychedelic Amphetamine. It's for more experienced Psych users. Doses are 1-5mg. It's Phenethylamine equivalent is 2C-C. It does have stimulant effects.

And yeah I'm expanding the Lim magic kitchen menu considerably atm. Also should have things like Diazepam, Xanax and other prescriptions soon including Adderal and hopefully I can cut the prices down a bit on that.

Title: Re: Chat more shit

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: ilovelsd69 on July 18, 2012, 11:39 pm
Quote from: Limetless on July 18, 2012, 11:37 pm
Lol that shit is fictitious dude.

Yeah I am not 100% on the Base yet, but seeing as I can get P2NP in unlimited amounts it sorta seems a bit like I'm wasting my time not doing it.

Yeah i know it's fiction
Quote
Author Hunter S. Thompson mentions adrenochrome in his book Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas. In the book it is derived from a living donor's adrenal gland ("removing the gland kills the extractor; it cannot be taken from a corpse"). As such, it is purported to be very exotic, and very intense: "the first wave felt like a combination of mescaline and methedrine".[7] Thompson reported a significant perceived rise in body temperature that led to paralysis. The adrenochrome scene also appears in the novel's film adaptation. In the DVD commentary, director Terry Gilliam admits that his and Thompson's portrayal is a fictional exaggeration. In fact, Gilliam insists that the drug is entirely fictional and seems unaware of the existence of a substance with even a similar name. Thompson also mentions the substance in his book Fear and Loathing on the Campaign Trail '72.

Quote
Author Hunter S. Thompson mentions adrenochrome in his book Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas. In the book it is derived from a living donor's adrenal gland ("removing the gland kills the extractor; it cannot be taken from a corpse"). As such, it is purported to be very exotic, and very intense: "the first wave felt like a combination of mescaline and methedrine".[7] Thompson reported a significant perceived rise in body temperature that led to paralysis. The adrenochrome scene also appears in the novel's film adaptation. In the DVD commentary, director Terry Gilliam admits that his and Thompson's portrayal is a fictional exaggeration. In fact, Gilliam insists that the drug is entirely fictional and seems unaware of the existence of a substance with even a similar name. Thompson also mentions the substance in his book Fear and Loathing on the Campaign Trail '72.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 20, 2012, 08:03 pm
Because I had this big order sorted out and basically I am not selling it from my own stock but basically buying it from the people who do my RCs and shipping directly to the client. I explained quite clearly that I need the cash up front because I'd essentially be buying it for them and my people don't front product like that. Chinese labs aren't Cartels that front you 100s of keys, they work contractually like all professional laboratories do, the only time they do favours is if you overpay them on a previous order or you have paid for something they couldn't do or something like that and even then, having a relationship like this takes time to establish. Anyway yeah, did all the price agreement, did the listing, guy ordered and then I said ok, once you have FE'd I'll get the shit into production and they responded saying "Wait a sec, you want me to FE for an XYZ costing order" when I had said this quite specifically beforehand.....

You have to bear in mind as well that I am not touching this order, it's going from my manufacturer directly to the client and I'm just putting a very minimal finders fee as an introductory price (which would go up on the second purchase) on top.

So yeah...piss-poor by all accounts IMO. Hoping he pulls it together so I don't have to get angry.

Oh and Metal is GAY! :P

Anyone watching The Talented Mr Ripley?

And also, would they protect your shipment from being seized by forging shipping docs, or vacuuming the stuff or is it just not necessary as sniffer dogs not trained to sniff out those kind of chems?? I dunno, I kno fuck all about it....Just a mash'ed!! :)

I am in awe of people who get this shit done, like Foxy Meow, Fred the Baker, Googleyed and your good self Lim.....Big Upz to people taking risks and being in the trenches to bring us these joyful products and getting paid suitably!!!! ;)

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Limetless on July 20, 2012, 09:24 pm
Without going into too much detail it's not hard to find Chinese/Indian labs but it is hard to find GOOD Chinese/Indian labs and even harder to find ones that will help you do illegal shit. And again, without going into too much detail they obviously take steps and implement certain measures when shipping yes but I wont discuss those openly.

It is a labour of love to find decent suppliers and ones that can do custom-synthesis or supply me lab equipment/precursors as well as the usual shit though. You have to build relationships with them just like you would a dealer/distributor for more common drugs. Doing them favours gets you quite far with them.

I don't know what is that, is it a psychedelic ?

I'll just steal the description from Erowid. :P

Oral 5-MeO-MIPT has some similarities with 5-MeO-DIPT. Users have reported aphrodisiac effects, minor changes in visual perception, mental stimulation, new perspectives, feelings of insight, emotional shifts, muscle tension, and mild tremor. The body load seems to be milder than with 5-MeO-DIPT. Sometimes there is a tendency of dreamy separation of mind and body as with 5-MeO-DMT. With the smoking route, more visuals and a "rush" are reported.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: LiberPater on July 21, 2012, 05:10 pm
Hi, just wanna ask a quick question and it does not deserve I thread.

Do still have good E pills in Europe and USA or just in Netherlands? I saw some very positive feedback for dutch vendors, but I don't wanna buy in silkroad due my situation.

I remember when I was teen, and it was not because I was teen, the pills were awesome! Nowadays it looks impossible to find pills containing mdma in Brazil, don't matter where you are inside the country.  I don't know what they have, we don't have lab test in Brazil, but they just keep you wake, what makes me believe its some caffeine/taurine/guaranine/bad cocaine [yeah, in S.A. makes sense cut E with coke], but that's all. I chewed a piece yesterday and at least the taste looks not so bad, of course I don't see it as advantage.

Some tricks to know if it is good before try it?
