Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: redalloverthelandguyhere on July 23, 2012, 04:12 pm
I also browse SR almost exclusively when working. I'll check an order at home if one is on its way but the forums I feel better getting paid for reading this shit!

 ;)

Anyhow, we were bored in work so a few of took a modofinil tablet 200mg. Still waiting for it to kick in.

One of the guys got some of sesampinos latest coke and reports its quality yayo. Not washed, no need, sometime you get a coke that needs no washing as there are no bad effects, no burn, no numbing instant effect plus the creeping slow euphoria, the classic tell take sign is the lack of want as with redosing.

Also, smoked some  silver haze, this was a sour type, lovely shit, and was a 12 weeker

Longest plant ever was the original Jack Herer which was left for 15 weeks. So lanky the guys supercropped several times - tied branches in knots.

Some its a typical Monday night shift. We got in early as we want to get off early. I am the sober one, only drank some beer and smoked some bud and hash this weekend but my other three musketeers were banging MDMA, 400mg of banging gear. They took it Saturday so its a suicidal Monday. Lazy bastards would play cards all night but its like we get paid for actual work. No work no pay so we tried the modafinil. One of the lads wants to do a few lines of coke but you cannot work on coke. Not in our game. Mixing yayo with modofinil seems a bit of a waste to me.

I don't care what drugs people use myself. I will happily smoke some top bud with the lads but the rule is that you have to handle your drugs here - no room for passengers who curl up into a ball after a bit of Indica home made hash. We got a gut into heroin, but the guy works, I don't give a shit if he is hitting up as long as he can work. He can be left alone on a job and never lets me down.

The worse are the alcoholics. Some are ok working but I am not cutting corners with health and safety. So if anyone comes in drunk, they can lie down out of the way.

Once worked with a bunch of Yugoslavians who were the biggest piss heads I ever saw. Some hated drugs also! Even argued with the English lads but the younger Yugoslavs were peace makers. Once big Yugoslav fronted me calling me a junkie for smoking hash. We put them right and made peace in the end. It was the younger Yugoslavs smoking a weed with us who stayed the pace and got their work done whilst the drunken ones slept.

Yanks were good to work with. One guy we passed him like 3.5 grams of bud to build a joint. He built a blunt for us. 3.5 grams of ever loving smoke. Got a bunch of us stoned as Bob Marley. Americans settled into the UK work style culture. We even let one guy slip back to the USA as his mum was sick. We covered and he got paid and even wept because we slipped in tons of overtime.

You always get stoners no matter what nationality. I like working with guys who turn on - even the ladies also.

We work hard, what the fuck is the problem with drugs being illegal?

Thanks SR!

Speaking from what I've learnt medically, when a natural sexual act is performed various chemicals are released by the brain including Dopamine, Norepinephrine, Oxytocin, Testosterone, there may be others I've forgotten about as I am no Neuroscientist! Don't see why your brain would want to limit them, when it's all good!

Unless someone knows more about this subject? I find this shit interesting! :)

I respect your efforts to help out men everywhere  ;)

But yes, your brain does release those chemicals in addition to reacting to the partner's pheromones. Your brain's reserves sort of deplete though, if you don't have consistent sex. Its a natural stimulant and if you don't keep doing it your brain needs time to reach homeostasis.

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: ilovelsd69 on July 24, 2012, 10:39 pm
Quote from: geedogg on July 24, 2012, 10:15 pm

Quote from: geedogg on July 24, 2012, 07:25 pm
Quote from: Gary Oak on July 24, 2012, 07:17 pm
Quote from: kryptoz on July 24, 2012, 07:12 pm

Just to be sure you still hate me when I come back, I rolled a fat blunt with 25mg of DMT sprinkled into to smoke on my break, it's going to be chill.

Oh and funny story, I found out the old former meth addict I used to work with is in jail for a while. What a shock! ::)

EZ peeps! ive still not done DMT but I'm gonna be very soon....Aint it a bit heavy to be busting on ya lunch break!? haha ;)

Also wanted to ask you guys....What is a 25i-NBOME trip like compared to acid or shrooms? Or even 2C-E? I'm keen to try it as its just so cheap its hard to pass that up... 

Oh Lim if ya here....Any closer to getting those samples out bruv? I'm itching to get that 4-Aco-DMT!! Is it similar to NN- DMT??

Im feeling trippy with the sun out finally!!  :P

Yeah i have tried some before, it is really like LSD but it is special in it's own way. Some users have reported that if you take 25i with mescaline the trip is as pleasurable as LSD and even better, 25i agonizes the following receptors:
5-HT2A (0.044), 5-HT2C (2), 5-HT6 (73), 5-HT2B (231), u opiate (82), kappa opiate [288]
and mescaline agonizes the following receptors :
Alpha2c (4.00), 5-HT2B (3.97), 5-HT1A (3.61) Imidazoline1 (3.44), 5-HT1E (3.16), alpha 2a (2.92) and poorly agonizes 5-HT2A & 5-HT2C. My next try will be to combine the two  ;) Theres a quote from a guy that have taken it with mescaline:

Quote
25i-nbome shares much of the mindspace of acid (euphoric, entheogenic) but has the visuals of DOI, when however 25i-nbome is combined with mescaline, the trip then becomes nearly indistibuishable from acid in every way (same meaningful archaic/mystical visuals), more visual than acid however, more pleasurable than acid, and music sounds even better than it does on acid, a few added benefits over acid, perhaps slightly more mystical as well, it lacks absolutely nothing, fully mind-manifesting. 100ug to 350ug of HPBCD complexed material under tongue for 20 minutes = light trip. When combining with 200 to 250mg of mescaline hcl, be sure to keep the 25i-nbome HPBCD complexed material at 350ug or so, you do not want the 5-ht2a & 5-h2c of the 25i-nbome to overpower the 5-ht1a and 5-ht1e of the mescaline, keep the receptors in balance if you want a beautiful very acid like experience, do not exceed 350ug of 25i-nbome, or the experience will become "too electric" and "too analytical", keep things in balance.

All of the great natural psychedelics like LSD, psilocybin, mescaline, dmt, etc. place 5-HT1A & 5-HT1E, 5-HT6 & 5-HT7 receptor agonism strength well ahead of 5-HT2A & 5-HT2C visual/complex behavior agonism, this keeps the trip spiritual, mystical, euphoric, serene, mind-manifesting and well-balanced. If you notice, most/many of the synthetics lack strong 5-HT1A & 5-HT1E agonism, which is why many of them can seem very "empty" and "emotionally neutral" or not fully mind-manifesting. Take a look at Ray's paper above attached and you'll see what I mean. You do not want 5-HT2A & 5-HT2C agonism to overide 5-HT1 agonism, unless you want a trip that is mostly meaningless visuals with little meaning to them. Keep the receptors in balance, study the paper, and you'll understand in time.
Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: kryptoz on July 24, 2012, 11:19 pm

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: ilovelsd69 on July 24, 2012, 11:21 pm

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: Gary Oak on July 24, 2012, 11:52 pm
Quote from: geedogg on July 24, 2012, 07:25 pm
Also wanted to ask you guys....What is a 25i-NBOME trip like compared to acid or shrooms? Or even 2C-E? I'm keen to try it as its just so cheap its hard to pass that up... 

Oh Lim if ya here....Any closer to getting those samples out bruv? I'm itching to get that 4-Aco-DMT!! Is it similar to NN- DMT??

25i-NBOMe is very tame compared to acid & boomers, I'd say it's almost entirely recreational in my opinion. It's energetic, gives great but not strong visuals, and gives a mildly trippy yet clear headspace as well. Overall it's a fun drug to do with inexperienced friends any day of the week, preferably outside because it's very synergetic with nature. ^-^ 2C-E is slightly stronger and feels like LSD light. The visuals are on par, although more sparkly, but the headspace isn't as enlightening as LSD. Everyone I know loves LSD, but 2C-E doesn't work as well with everyone because it's picky in a way. Some folks get euphoria comparable to MDMA coming up, others get twitchy and puke and feel terrible coming up although most feel better after the purge. It's definitely worth trying though and so long as you're lucky enough to enjoy it, it can be one of your favorites like it is mine. ;) Out of the two, I really like 2C-E better. 25i-NBOMe makes me feel too tense and my body gets sore after the peak and the trip is only a few hours long, while 2C-E makes me feel super and lasts at the least twice as long so it's twice the fun. :))

As for 4-AcO-DMT it's nothing at all like DMT, they're not even in the same family I believe. It's like 5-MeO-DMT, they both end in DMT but are completely different experiences...tricky little fuckers. :D I'm still waiting on my sample from Limetless before I buy any so I can't speak from experience, but from what I've read on the substance it's exactly like shrooms without the nausea and instead is much softer and calmer. I hope I get mine soon though because I've been wanting some for when I go camping soon but don't know if it's worth it. So if I get it this week I can try it out and buy some for the trip, otherwise I'm just going to buy an ounce of shrooms considering they're more reliable at the moment. :D

Oh, and about doses I prefer 2mg for 25i and 26mg for 2C-E, but if you're just starting out I'd probably go with 1mg 25i and 15mg 2C-E. I've gone up to 6mg of 25i and 32mg 2C-E and all I noticed was the negative effects increased while the positive stayed the same so there's no point in going higher with either of them. So basically tread lightly and you'll have a blast and a half. ;D

Title: Re: Chat more shit
Post by: ilovelsd69 on July 25, 2012, 03:49 am
Quote from: Gary Oak on July 24, 2012, 11:52 pm
Quote from: geedogg on July 24, 2012, 07:25 pm
Also wanted to ask you guys....What is a 25i-NBOME trip like compared to acid or shrooms? Or even 2C-E? I'm keen to try it as its just so cheap its hard to pass that up... 

Oh Lim if ya here....Any closer to getting those samples out bruv? I'm itching to get that 4-Aco-DMT!! Is it similar to NN- DMT??

25i-NBOMe is very tame compared to acid & boomers, I'd say it's almost entirely recreational in my opinion. It's energetic, gives great but not strong visuals, and gives a mildly trippy yet clear headspace as well. Overall it's a fun drug to do with inexperienced friends any day of the week, preferably outside because it's very synergetic with nature. ^-^ 2C-E is slightly stronger and feels like LSD light. The visuals are on par, although more sparkly, but the headspace isn't as enlightening as LSD. Everyone I know loves LSD, but 2C-E doesn't work as well with everyone because it's picky in a way. Some folks get euphoria comparable to MDMA coming up, others get twitchy and puke and feel terrible coming up although most feel better after the purge. It's definitely worth trying though and so long as you're lucky enough to enjoy it, it can be one of your favorites like it is mine. ;) Out of the two, I really like 2C-E better. 25i-NBOMe makes me feel too tense and my body gets sore after the peak and the trip is only a few hours long, while 2C-E makes me feel super and lasts at the least twice as long so it's twice the fun. :))

As for 4-AcO-DMT it's nothing at all like DMT, they're not even in the same family I believe. It's like 5-MeO-DMT, they both end in DMT but are completely different experiences...tricky little fuckers. :D I'm still waiting on my sample from Limetless before I buy any so I can't speak from experience, but from what I've read on the substance it's exactly like shrooms without the nausea and instead is much softer and calmer. I hope I get mine soon though because I've been wanting some for when I go camping soon but don't know if it's worth it. So if I get it this week I can try it out and buy some for the trip, otherwise I'm just going to buy an ounce of shrooms considering they're more reliable at the moment. :D

Oh, and about doses I prefer 2mg for 25i and 26mg for 2C-E, but if you're just starting out I'd probably go with 1mg 25i and 15mg 2C-E. I've gone up to 6mg of 25i and 32mg 2C-E and all I noticed was the negative effects increased while the positive stayed the same so there's no point in going higher with either of them. So basically tread lightly and you'll have a blast and a half. ;D

Good insight Gary  ;D i'm afraid i am not so good at explaining what a trip look like lol. For me a 25i trip is more enjoyable with friends, it's turn out to be a totally different trip than alone. Also the blotters i have received from SR a couple of months ago were not equally potent because for the same quantity i have not got the same visuals. That's the reason why i decided to lay them myself   :P 1000ug is supposed to be a strong trip, after one week you can redo 1000ug and the trip will be similar, that's what i like of 25i you can redo it week after week (at a better price than LSD) and you get a cool trip each time. Have you tested the mescaline on SR Gary BTW ?

25i-NBOMe is very tame compared to acid & boomers, I'd say it's almost entirely recreational in my opinion. It's energetic, gives great but not strong visuals, and gives a mildly trippy yet clear headspace as well. Overall it's a fun drug to do with inexperienced friends any day of the week, preferably outside because it's very synergetic with nature. ^-^ 2C-E is slightly stronger and feels like LSD light. The visuals are on par, although more sparkly, but the headspace isn't as enlightening as LSD. Everyone I know loves LSD, but 2C-E doesn't work as well with everyone because it's picky in a way. Some folks get euphoria comparable to MDMA coming up, others get twitchy and puke and feel terrible coming up although most feel better after the purge. It's definitely worth trying though and so long as you're lucky enough to enjoy it, it can be one of your favorites like it is mine. ;) Out of the two, I really like 2C-E better. 25i-NBOMe makes me feel too tense and my body gets sore after the peak and the trip is only a few hours long, while 2C-E makes me feel super and lasts at the least twice as long so it's twice the fun. :))

It's like 5-MeO-DMT, they both end in DMT but are completely different experiences...tricky little fuckers. :D I'm still waiting on my sample from Limetless before I buy any so I can't speak from experience, but from what I've read on the substance it's exactly like shrooms without the nausea and instead is much softer and calmer. I hope I get mine soon though because I've been wanting some for when I go camping soon but don't know if it's worth it. So if I get it this week I can try it out and buy some for the trip, otherwise I'm just going to buy an ounce of shrooms considering they're more reliable at the moment. :D

Oh, and about doses I prefer 2mg for 25i and 26mg for 2C-E, but if you're just starting out I'd probably go with 1mg 25i and 15mg 2C-E. I've gone up to 6mg of 25i and 32mg 2C-E and all I noticed was the negative effects increased while the positive stayed the same so there's no point in going higher with either of them. So basically tread lightly and you'll have a blast and a half. ;D

Good insight Gary  ;D i'm afraid i am not so good at explaining what a trip look like lol. For me a 25i trip is more enjoyable with friends, it's turn out to be a totally different trip than alone. Also the blotters i have received from SR a couple of months ago were not equally potent because for the same quantity i have not got the same visuals. That's the reason why i decided to lay them myself   :P 1000ug is supposed to be a strong trip, after one week you can redo 1000ug and the trip will be similar, that's what i like of 25i you can redo it week after week (at a better price than LSD) and you get a cool trip each time. Have you tested the mescaline on SR Gary BTW ?

If you want a way to better explain the visuals of psychedelics, visit this link as it even provides examples. It was fun the first time I visited it, I was like "Oh shit I've seen that before! :o".
http://www.disregardeverythingisay.com/post/9331287956/the-visual-components-of-a-psychedelic-experience

As for the mescaline I have not, the only listings ever available are just not worth the price in my opinion. :-\ I'd rather drop $100 on 25 tabs of LSD than 1 gram of mescaline any day of the week.

Post by: Globian on July 25, 2012, 10:52 am

wheres the news on intersango fraud?

yeah i haven't used gox since they started insisting on ID - fuck dat! but i've heard a whisper on they may have helped MIN's downfall. don't know if there's any substance to it, but a whisper is enough to put me off

How do you have to show them the ID? It wouldn't be too hard to edit the ID, and once they've seen it they'll most likely believe you're using the bitcoins for legal reasons and leave you be.

Fuck Intersango, sent them 40 on Monday and then realised there was a problem, like Vlad said it is a tad suspicious that they said there was a technical error yet there account is under investigation, you'd think if there account was frozen they'd know that that was the problem immediately and informed their users about it rather then state it was a technical error. I ended up transferring 35 to mtgox yesterday evening and awoke today to find it in my account :). Also only just managed to get the last of Jannis' 5x blotters which was lucky :D, if anyone is unaware of Jannis at the moment he's a new LSD vendor who has very nice prices, paid 32 for 5 (110ug) and IIRC 10 was about 55, so far he has 100% feedback from ~30 transactions and allows you to stay in escrow provided you've spent double the amount of bitcoins worth the listing price.

Scarface - Obv.
Boyz n tha Hood - great fucking movie, period.

I haven't seen those (except Scarface ofc) so I'll put them on my watchlist 8) Thanks too

Same here, we have a load of vintage car fanatics around here, that beautifully restore their cars, they are works of art, and plus they are tax exempt in the UK when they are over the age of 25 years old - Motoring tradition should be kept alive!  :)

My friend has got a lovely BMW convertible on a 09 plate, with all the extras, it's falling apart at the seams, it was originally about 50K's worth of car WTF? BMW is supposed to be a luxury car brand, known for its durability! :o

Sounds like getting an old car and restoring it back to its former glory is a wise investment, it will keep it's value and won't let you down :)

Smartphones are built to die, the greedy corporations have found out they can make more profit this way, it's a money making scamola! They don't want you changing your phone every couple of years or so like back in the day, they want you changing every couple of months, upgrade, update, upgrade, update, money, money, money!

It's funny what's smart can sometimes work out to be stupid!  ;)

Same,  my mates got a nice looking Merc, few years old but it's a shit heap, I've already done a few big jobs on it and I'm shocked at how poorly built they are. I drive an oldie, it's well into its teenage years and its in mint condition, bodywork is at 99.5%, engine is perfect, never not started 1st time, I use a few newer cars too and they just aint aging well, rust on a post 2000 car, wtf? :(

Just put together a huge vat of Kuzu Guvec (Turkish Lamb Strew)  :D

Needs to go on a very low heat for four hours, then I'll be dishing it up in little terracotta dishes, and sprinkling Kasar Peynir (special Turkish cheese, their equivalent of mozzarella!) on top, when that's done, I'll put it in the oven and bake until the cheese turns golden brown!

It's a very tasty stew indeed!  :)

TT, would you not agree to some extent anyway, that 'words' are the source of misunderstanding? Really as long as we can't look at each other (even touch each other to help transfer and receive feelings with those words/thoughts) as we attempt to communicate a thought of clarity - for only with the heart can one do the meaning of words - we will, we CAN misunderstand each other.

So if 'words' ARE the source of misunderstanding then those same .... things typed onto a monitor's screen from a key board, sent as a text - any form of electronic transference of thought from one to another(s) has the most potential to be infinity less accurate than those same misunderstood words of thoughts.

Quote & Response of the day

Quote from: Watchman Calling on December 18, 2012, 09:03 am
Guys, this place is compromised - the gig is up.  How you people cannot see that in November too many things changed too quickly is a sign that overall you have become too lax with your expectations and your water is boiling beyond your ability to see through your drug and profit induced haze.

All you big timers who are getting retardedly rich throwing pounds of this stuff around the mail will dismiss this and will get what is coming to you.  Those of you who like me who were here because it fascinated you or you're just curious, do yourself a favor and walk now while you still can. Go back to local sources, or clean up and move on with your life.

I had an account on the main site and an account on the forums here until my own supply line from Mr Ouid came under surveillance a little while ago.  This guy was by far the nicest guy I've never known, and I hope to god i'm wrong, but when too many *extremely* unlikely things happen in quick succession, you have to separate yourself from the rest of the pack and take a renewed interest in your personal freedom above your temporary satisfaction.

I hope I'm wrong, but guys, come on.  What did you think would happen?
